titles.title: Thou Shalt Love The Lord Thy God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Thou shalt love the Lord thy God
With all thy heart, and soul, and might,
And thy neighbor as thyself.
Engrave these words upon thine heart.
When thy son shall ask of Thee,
What do these commandments mean?
You shall say, We are alive
Because they taught our hearts to fear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Make them frame the works of your hands,
Build up the poses of your house,
Guard the vision of your eyes,
Constantly watch at your gates.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Teach when you sit in the house,
Talk when you walk in the way.
Pray at the time that you lie down,
Sing when you rise up in the day.
